title: Big Tech military contracts, Compass's IPO, and President Biden's $2 trillion infrastructure plan
description:
In this episode of Pivot, Kara and Scott talk about Big Tech getting involved in military matters, and how their employees are responding. They also discuss whether Compass really counts as real estate tech, and fawn over President Biden's $2 trillion dollar infrastructure plan. Also, Kara plays a little April Fools joke on Scott, and spoiler alert—it works.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
